mapper.insert: insert into t_proattach (id, atth_num, pro_id, ord_id, ptid, Submitter_id, Submitter_num, atth_url, atth_name, type, file_name, atth_ver, size, atth_content, section_num, create_time, create_uid, create_user, ordered, delflag, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{atthNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submitterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submitterNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{atthUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atthName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atthVer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{atthContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordered,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delflag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
